title: India to add 18 more Nuclear power reactors with total capacity of 13,800 MWe by 2032: NPCIL
description: India aims to add 18 nuclear power reactors with a capacity of 13,800 MWe by 2031-32. Prime Minister Narendra Modi recently dedicated two 700 MW reactors at Kakrapar Atomic Power Station in Gujarat, showcasing Atmanirbhar Bharat. Additional power plants are being built at Kudankulam, Chutka, and Mahi Banswara.
